result.eng: They would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ga: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.orig: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálach
result.html: Bhainidís díoltas amach ar úinéirí talún a bhí cruálachThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.
result.ponchtml: Ḃainidís díoltas amaċ ar úinéirí talún a ḃí cruálaċThey would take revenge on landlords who were cruel.

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.orig: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
result.html: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibriṫe a ṁeallaḋ as an Eoraip ná as MeiriceáEstate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
